channel.title: [PI] Quest Interface
channel.description: I just added a quest, dialogue, and everything else that goes along with a quest. The only thing i'm having a problem on is the quest interface. I have added the name of the quest to the quest tab and was able to change the colors when you start and finish this quest, but when you click on the name of the quest, nothing pops up. I want the quest interface to pop-up. I know the id of the quest interface; which is 8134. Is this correct?

item.title: [PI] Quest Interface
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Nice Boots, post:7, topic:509327”]Is there a different interface I can use?[/quote]nope, unless you make your own

Read full topic

@Nice_Boots wrote:

Is there a different interface I can use?

item.title: [PI] Quest Interface
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Nice Boots, post:5, topic:509327”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=627573.msg4264769#msg4264769 date=1363903666]

[quote author=Nice Boots link=topic=627573.msg4264759#msg4264759 date=1363902687]

[quote author=Sup22211 link=topic=627573.msg4264757#msg4264757 date=1363902373]
what do you mean? check it by using
showInterface(8134);
in your button action handler.
[/quote]Yea, it’s correct, but when it opens; it looks like this,

Plus, it has like 85qjs above that and doesn’t show the text I added to the interface.
[/quote]Means a hard coded interface is using a sub id for something. removve that interface and it will work

[/quote]Remove what interface? The loyalty one? I can’t really remove it due to the fact that i’m using it.[/quote]well that succks

Read full topic
